name: Farm Onet! Fruit Fresh
description:
Farm Onet! Fruit Fresh is a classic yet innovative Onet game.
Connect 2 matching fruit cards using three or fewer straight lines to clear fruit cards, clear all match pairs to go next stage.
How to play Onet?
1. Tap the fruit to select it.
2. Connect 2 same fruits by using 3 or less than 3 lines to eliminate.
3. Clear all fruit pairs before timeout.
